Sentencas: Highly dispersed composite powders of NiO and yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) were synthesized through a newly developed co-precipitation method, using an organic base solution that contains an anionic zirconium carbonate complex.
Titulo: Effect of composition on microstructure and polarization resistance of solid oxide fuel cell anode Ni-YSZ composites made by co-precipitation

Sentencas: It was found that a wide variation in composition can be achieved in this way.
Titulo: Effect of composition on microstructure and polarization resistance of solid oxide fuel cell anode Ni-YSZ composites made by co-precipitation

Sentencas: Subsequent investigation of the effect of composition on microstructure and polarization resistance of sintered Ni-YSZ anodes revealed a significant variation in microstructure and polarization resistance.
Titulo: Effect of composition on microstructure and polarization resistance of solid oxide fuel cell anode Ni-YSZ composites made by co-precipitation

Sentencas: An Ni content of 40% by volume produces the finest and most uniformly porous anode structure with the lowest polarization resistance of approximately 0.18 Omega cm(2) at 800 degrees C in a 97% H-2+3% H2O atmosphere.
Titulo: Effect of composition on microstructure and polarization resistance of solid oxide fuel cell anode Ni-YSZ composites made by co-precipitation
